attributes.action: Give all GCSE students their target grades as their real grades and shut schools
attributes.additional_details: I am a GCSE student myself and I know how much COVID-19 is going to effect the UK. It is because of this, I believe schools should be shut but that would affect exam results. Thus, I feel it would be fair to give all current GCSE students their target grades as their real grades so people can self isolate and still get good grades.
attributes.background: I want the government to shut schools due to COVID-19 and give all current GCSE students their target grades for each subject as their real grades. This is the fairest way to prevent the spread of COVID-19 without jeopardising the future of students.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling for all schools and colleges to be closed due to coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
